content.en: Algorithmic Optimization: Researchers have been exploring the use of algorithms to solve various problems in software engineering. For example, multi-objective evolutionary algorithms (MOEAs) have been shown to outperform other approaches in optimizing testing resource allocation in modular software systems. Another algorithm, NSGA-II, has been used to balance customer satisfaction and requirement cost in the next release of software. These findings highlight the potential of algorithms to improve software engineering processes and outcomes.
content.da: Algoritmisk optimering: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af algoritmer til at løse forskellige problemer inden for software engineering. For eksempel har multi-målsætnings evolutionære algoritmer (MOEAs) vist sig at overgå andre metoder i optimering af testressourceallokering i modulære softwaresystemer. En anden algoritme, NSGA-II, er blevet brugt til at balancere kundetilfredshed og kravomkostninger i den næste softwareudgivelse. Disse resultater fremhæver potentialet for algoritmer til at forbedre software engineering-processer og resultater.
